com.mob41.hkoweather.api

Class WeatherManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mob41.hkoweather.api.WeatherManager

  • public class WeatherManager
extends java.lang.Object

    WeatherManager

    public class WeatherManager
    A weather manager which manages the weather report.
    Automatically fetching weather report from HKO if specified.
    Author:
    Anthony

    • Constructor Detail

      • WeatherManager

        public WeatherManager()
               throws InvaildStationException

        WeatherManager

        public WeatherManager() throws InvaildStationException
        Create a new weather manager.

        Using default Tsim Sha Tsui HKO Weather Station.
        Throws:
        InvaildStationException - if default station code goes wrong.

      • WeatherManager

               throws InvaildStationException

        WeatherManager

        public WeatherManager(int station) throws InvaildStationException
        Create a new weather manager.
        Parameters:
        station - - Specify a weather station code's INDEX
        Throws:
        InvaildStationException - if the specified index was invalid.

        WeatherManager

        public WeatherManager(String station) throws InvaildStationException
        Create a new weather manager
        Parameters:
        station - - Specify a weather station code, e.g. HKO, WTS
        Throws:
        InvaildStationException - if the specified was invalidd.

    • Method Detail

      • getWeatherReport

        public WeatherReport getWeatherReport()

        getWeatherReport

        public WeatherReport getWeatherReport()
        Get the weather report of the weather manager.
        You have to call this function: 
        fetchWeatherReport()
        to get the weather report. Or you will receive a non-initialized WeatherReport.
        Returns:
        WeatherReport - A weather report fetched from HKO or a non-initialized variable.

      • loadReport

        public void loadReport(WeatherReport report)

        loadReport

        public void loadReport(WeatherReport report)
        Load a weather report to the manager.
        Parameters:
        report - A weather report generated or created.

      • setFetchInterval

        public void setFetchInterval(int ms)

        setFetchInterval

        public void setFetchInterval(int ms)
        Set the fetching interval of the weather report.
        To start the interval, remember to call: 
         startFetchInterval()
        Parameters:
        ms - Interval in milliseconds.

      • resetFetchInterval

        public void resetFetchInterval()

        resetFetchInterval

        public void resetFetchInterval(int ms)
        Resets the interval to default interval. (60000 ms)

      • startFetchInterval

        public void startFetchInterval()

        startFetchInterval

        public void startFetchInterval()
        Start fetch interval thread.

      • stopFetchInterval

        public void stopFetchInterval()

        stopFetchInterval

        public void stopFetchInterval()
        Stop fetch interval thread.

      • fetchWeatherReport

        public WeatherReport fetchWeatherReport()
                                 throws FetchWeatherException,
                                        InvaildReportException

        fetchWeatherReport

        public WeatherReport fetchWeatherReport()
        Fetch the weather report from Hong Kong Observatory.
        with the weather station specified before.
        Returns:
        WeatherReport - with all the weather-related data.
        Throws:
        FetchWeatherException - Could not fetch the weather report successfully.
        InvaildReportException - The report fetched was invalid.
